com.communote.server.api.core.note

Interface AutosavePropertyFilterProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RepostAutosavePropertyFilterProvider

    public interface AutosavePropertyFilterProvider
    Provider to get PropertyFilters for retrieving an existing autosave. This is for example useful if there should be a unique autosave for notes that have a specific note property.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<StringPropertyFilter> getFiltersForComment(Long parentNoteId, Collection<StringPropertyTO> properties)
      Get the filter for retrieving an autosave for a comment to a note.
      Collection<StringPropertyFilter> getFiltersForCreate(Collection<StringPropertyTO> properties)
      Get the filter for retrieving an autosave for a new note.
      Collection<StringPropertyFilter> getFiltersForUpdate(Long noteId, Collection<StringPropertyTO> properties)
      Get the filter for retrieving an autosave for editing a note.

    • Method Detail

      • getFiltersForComment

        Collection<StringPropertyFilter> getFiltersForComment(Long parentNoteId,
                                                      Collection<StringPropertyTO> properties)
        Get the filter for retrieving an autosave for a comment to a note.
        Parameters:
        parentNoteId - the ID of the note for which the comment is created
        properties - the properties which should be stored with the comment
        Returns:
        the filters for getting the autosave. Can be null if no filter is needed.

      • getFiltersForCreate

        Collection<StringPropertyFilter> getFiltersForCreate(Collection<StringPropertyTO> properties)
        Get the filter for retrieving an autosave for a new note.
        Parameters:
        properties - the properties which should be stored with the note
        Returns:
        the filters for getting the autosave. Can be null if no filter is needed.

      • getFiltersForUpdate

        Collection<StringPropertyFilter> getFiltersForUpdate(Long noteId,
                                                     Collection<StringPropertyTO> properties)
        Get the filter for retrieving an autosave for editing a note.
        Parameters:
        noteId - the ID of the note which is updated
        properties - the properties which should be stored with the note
        Returns:
        the filters for getting the autosave. Can be null if no filter is needed.
